channel.title: Interface Configuration and Management on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Interface Configuration and Management on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: Switch Port Attributes
item.description: This chapter discusses the various network interfaces on a switch running Cumulus Linux, how to configure various interface-level settings (if needed) and some troubleshooting commands. Interface Types Cumulus Linux exposes network interfaces for several types of physical and logical devices: lo, network loopback device ethN, switch management port(s), for out of band management only swpN, switch front panel ports (optional) brN, bridges (IEEE 802.1Q VLANs)
